channel.title: Help with Spells of The God Mini-game

item.title: Help with Spells of The God Mini-game
item.dc:creator: @o_b_b_y_k_o o b b y k o
item.description:
@o_b_b_y_k_o wrote:

I am trying to make a Spells of the God Mini-game. Any ideas on how I can make it so that once u kill 50 battle mages u can use them? like so

if ([NPCID]killcount < 50); sendMessage ("You have not completed the Spells of The Gods Mini-game!"); } else } if ([NPCID]killcount >= 50); (USE SPELL ID THING HERE)

I just made this in 30 seconds so please help me make one that works.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 22, 2008, 08:28:57 PM[/size][hr]plz![br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2008, 03:21:14 PM[/size][hr]anybody?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with Spells of The God Mini-game
